trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_SEQ_00<tab>This Mol maiden cannot wait to go shopping in Reunion.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Mol maiden.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_01<tab>Obtain herbs.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Mol maiden.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_03<tab>Obtain shears.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the Mol maiden.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_05<tab>Obtain seeds.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the herbs, shears, and seeds to the Mol maiden.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_000<tab>Could I ask you to accompany me while I go shopping?
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_001<tab>The udgan told me I am to go shopping with an adventurer today. Meet me in Reunion if you have the time.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_010<tab>Thank you for joining me! I just managed to buy a sack of herbs for a great price.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_011<tab>Though I am not sure if I'm capable of taking them all the way back to Mol Iloh...
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_012<tab>Do you think you would be able to carry them for me? I am going to go and look at that stall over there. Thank you!
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_020<tab>Oh, I just found the loveliest pair of sheep shears.

TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_021<tab>Could you manage to carry them as well? I have heard one of the stalls here is going to be running a special sale soon. I need to hurry and find out which!
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_030<tab>I am so lucky you are here with me today. I never could have dreamed I would be able to buy so many seeds for such a low price!

TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_031<tab>Though it seems I sprained my ankle running around searching for the sale just now. Could you be a darling and carry my shopping back home for me? Oh, thank you. You are too kind!
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_040<tab>My ankle feels fine now─it is a miracle! Would you happen to have my purchases?
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_041<tab>Doubtless it was a heavy load, but I bet it felt like nothing for a strong adventurer such as yourself.

TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_042<tab>Let me tell you, it was not easy getting my hands on those seeds. They taste incredible when cooked and can also be turned into oil. I had to make full use of my elbows just to avoid missing out.
TEXT_STMBDZ522_02773_ASSERTIVEWOMAN02773_000_043<tab>Of course, it would not have been possible without your help. Here is a reward for all your hard work!
